topic.title: Nested virtualization for AMD processors
topic.shortdesc: Nested virtualization is a feature that allows you to run Hyper-V inside of a Hyper-V virtual machine VM. Windows Server 2022 brings support for nested virtualization using AMD processors, giving more choices of hardware for your environments. More information can be found at the nested virtualization documentation/virtualization/hyper-v-on-windows/user-guide/nested-virtualization.
